properties.name: minecraft.server.host
properties.description: The host of the regular Minecraft server to work as a facade for.

properties.name: minecraft.server.port
properties.description: The port of the regular Minecraft server to work as a facade for. Defaults to '25565'.

properties.name: minecraft.server.worker-threads
properties.description: The number of threads the worker group should use. Defaults to '2'.

properties.name: minecraft.pocket-edition.ip
properties.description: The IP of the Minecraft Pocket Edition facade server to bind to. Defaults to '0.0.0.0.'.

properties.name: minecraft.pocket-edition.port
properties.description: The port of the Minecraft Pocket Edition facade server to bind to. Defaults to '19232'.

properties.name: minecraft.pocket-edition.worker-threads
properties.description: The number of threads the worker group should use. Defaults to '2'.
